Name: Surgeflow
Tagline: Automate your browser tasks with a single command
Topics: Browser Extensions, Chrome Extensions, Productivity, Artificial Intelligence
Description: See the plan. Approve it. Watch it execute. SurgeFlow turns browser chaos into transparent automation across multiple tabs. Research, shopping, job applicationsâ€”all with one command. Works in your browserâ€”no need to download or install a new one.

Name: Qwen-Image-Layered
Tagline: Turn flat images into multi-layer editable assets
Topics: Open Source, Artificial Intelligence, Photo editing
Description: Qwen-Image-Layered decomposes images into transparent RGBA layers, unlocking inherent editability. You can move, resize, or delete objects without artifacts. Supports recursive decomposition and variable layer counts.

Name: ConnectMachine
Tagline: A private AI agent that manages your network and connections
Description: ConnectMachine is a privacy-first AI Agent that elevates how you connect. Craft bespoke digital business cards, share only what you choose, and explore your network with intuitive voice or text queries. It replaces social broadcasting with intelligent contact management, auto-categorizing connections, and add in an AI Agent to query your network. A refined, intelligent contact layer created for those who prefer intention over noise and elegance over excess. Available for both, iOS and Android.

Name: Claude in Chrome
Tagline: Let Claude see, click, type, and navigate in your browser
Topics: Browser Extensions, Chrome Extensions, Artificial Intelligence
Description: Now Claude can navigate, click buttons, and fill forms in your browser. It works with Claude Code and Claude Desktop and is available in beta to all paid subscribers. After months of real-world testing, we're expanding to all paid plans. We've also shipped our most requested feature: an integration for Claude Code. Build in your terminal, verify in your browser, and debug with Claude reading console errors and DOM state directly.

Name: Whisper Snapper for Mac
Tagline: Local transcripts with speaker labels, timestamps, + export
Description: Transcribe videos, podcasts, meetings, and voice memos with the fastest, most accurate AI modelsâ€”running locally on your Mac or in the cloud with your own API keys. Speaker labels, timestamps, and export to SRT, Markdown, PDF, and more. Try free or one-time lifetime $9.99 Pro.

Name: Mistral OCR 3
Tagline: Accurate OCR for notes, forms, tables and handwriting
Description: Mistral OCR 3 extracts text and images from documents with SOTA accuracy. It handles handwriting, complex tables, and scanned forms, outputting clean markdown.

Name: Flowdrop V1.1
Tagline: Turn plain English into working automations & workflows
Description: Flowdrop turns chat into automation. Just tell us what you want. Our AI builds it for you. Connect Gmail, Slack, Sheets, Telegram, X, LinkedIn and more. Zero code. NEW THIS WEEK: Human in the loop forms so you can approve steps before they run. See changes live. Keep what works. YouTube video to text. Apify actors. Real time checks so you stay in control. Stop doing the same tasks twice. Build in seconds, not hours. Try us free at flowdrop.ai

Name: Routine Android
Tagline: Turn meetings into notes, auto-create tasks + plan your week
Description: Routine now supports the Android platform, allowing you to manage all your tasks, calendars, projects, notes and more through Routine's local-first & AI-powered workspace.

Name: wafer
Tagline: Wafer is the GPU dev stack that lives inside your IDE
Topics: Software Engineering, Developer Tools, Artificial Intelligence
Description: Wafer is the GPU development stack that lives inside your editor: profiling, compiler explorer, and GPU docsâ€”all in one place. Writing GPU kernels means jumping between fragmented tools: editing here, profiling there, docs in a browser, compiler explorer in another tab. Wafer pulls everything back into your IDE.

Name: ArkTabs
Tagline: Spotlight style tab manager with fuzzy search & live preview
Description: ArkTabs t is lightning-fast tab organizer that turns your browser into a productivity powerhouse. Inspired by launchers like Alfred or Spotlight, it lets you fuzzy-search, group, manage tabs, and even use an omnibar for web searches and direct navigation in seconds. Press Alt + P to access everything. Open tabs, bookmarks, history, recently closed sessions, and custom workspaces are all in one unified interface. Useful for everyone, casual users, researchers, programmers.

Name: Enter Space
Tagline: All your cloud storage in a single app
Description: Connect to 62 different cloud storage accounts on your Apple device with seamless Finder and Files integration, encrypted backups, and automated sync.

Name: Sprout
Tagline: A kanban board that feels at home on your Mac
Description: A few months ago I started looking for a simple kanban board to manage all my tasks, as I was getting crazy with the load of work I had. I spent weeks looking for one that was private, offline, that wasn't bloated with a ton of useless features. So I built Sprout ðŸŒ±, a simple and native Kanban board for Mac. - No accounts - No noise (0 notifications, ads, useless features) - 100% private (it uses CoreData and iCloud).

Name: Tessera Designer
Tagline: Make seamless pattern tiles to download and use
Description: Create seamless tiles and production-ready pattern assets in minutes: pick from a large library of shapes, text, symbols, and more, customize everything to your liking, and let Tessera Designer intelligently lay it out on the canvas. Finally, export clean, seamlessly repeatable patterns that are genuinely fun (and easy) to make.

Name: Track Link
Tagline: Link tracking & analytics platform
Description: Powerful link tracking and analytics for marketers, creators, and businesses. Custom domains, UTM tracking, conversion attribution, and real-time click monitoring.

Name: Cenphi
Tagline: Your Story Amplified
Description: Cenphi helps businesses collect, manage, and leverage text and video testimonials with AI. Automatically generate clips, social posts, and marketing content from customer stories. Boost trust and conversions with authentic video reviews.

Name: Kirkify
Tagline: Drag & drop your image. Watch it Kirkify instantly.
Description: Kirkify is an AI meme studio that turns photos into bold satirical edits in seconds. Exports come with a built-in satire/AI disclosure label + watermark by default, plus ready-to-post sizes for social.

Name: PromptRanked
Tagline: Track how AI models rank your website
Description: Monitor your brand's visibility across many AI models. Understand which prompts drive traffic to your site and optimize your AI presence.

Name: Capty
Tagline: Screen capture app for Mac
Description: Capty is a powerful screen capture and recording app for macOS. Take screenshots, record your screen, and make them look stunning with the built-in editor.

Name: AppReviews
Tagline: Never miss an app review again.
Description: AppReviews centralizes App Store and Google Play reviews, sends new feedback to Slack in real time, and lets teams reply directly while context is still fresh. No more manual checks, no more missed conversations. Optional AI groups similar reviews and surfaces trends, without replacing human judgment.

Name: ResumeDev
Tagline: developer-friendly-resume-builder
Description: ResumeDev is an ATS-ready resume builder for developers. Skip templates and layout tweaking â€” write your resume in Markdown with live preview and clean PDF export. No signup required. Free plan includes up to 3 exports.
